alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 2:33AM CDT until October 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures generally bottoming out between 29 and 32 degrees for most areas, but as low as 26 to 28 degrees northwest of the Tri-Cities around Ord, Loup City, and Lexington. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
